function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Adversaries attacking databases with sensitive information pose security risks.","Impact":"Compromised availability of e-health systems.","Mitigation":"Implement strong access controls and encryption to protect sensitive data in databases.","Technologies":"Access controls, encryption","People":"Healthcare professionals, patients","Owner":"IT security team"},{"Description":"Integration of MIoT increases security risks of healthcare systems, making them vulnerable to DoS attacks.","Impact":"Compromised security and integrity of patient data.","Mitigation":"Design lightweight and scalable security mechanisms for MIoTs, employ encrypted data transmission, and implement distributed security solutions like blockchain.","Technologies":"MIoT security mechanisms, encryption, blockchain","People":"Healthcare professionals, IT security team","Owner":"IT security team"},{"Description":"Massive connected devices increase the attack surface for unauthorized operations on the healthcare system.","Impact":"Increased risk of unauthorized access and operations on the healthcare system.","Mitigation":"Implement continuous security updates, employ AI and ML techniques in 5G systems, and ensure encrypted data transmission.","Technologies":"AI/ML techniques, 5G systems, encrypted data transmission","People":"Healthcare professionals, IT security team","Owner":"IT security team"}]}
